column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Wow!  Fantastic! 2 of my teens were craving ramen so we tried JINYA.  Son got the pork bun/bao
column2: he ordered the spicy chicken ramen with a side order of dumplings.  Although he gobbled it down
column3: he enjoyed it very much and kept commenting how great it was. Daughter ordered the OLD SKOOL ramen and said it was so yummy. I had the shrimp balls (so yummy and juicy) and the spicy tuna tacos - very flavorful with just the right amount my of spice.  One of the most delicious lunches I've had in a long while.
